meanings.definition: The hard, dense calcareous substance forming the bulk of a tooth beneath the enamel.
meanings.sent1: The dentist explained that dentines are the main part of a tooth.
meanings.sent2: Brushing your teeth helps protect the dentines from decay.
meanings.sent3: The dentines in the tooth were having a party, celebrating their strength.
meanings.sent4: Her smile revealed dentines as white as pearls.
meanings.sent5: The dentist showed me an x-ray highlighting the dentines in my teeth.

meanings.definition: The substance of the teeth, surrounding the pulp and comprising the bulk of the tooth.
meanings.sent1: The dentines in the tooth provide support and structure.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined the dentines carefully during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The dentines whispered secrets to the enamel, their protective neighbor.
meanings.sent4: His words were as strong as dentines, leaving a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The dentines gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing their durability.
